articles.description: The U.S. Auto Club on Sunday announced Justin Owen died from the injuries he suffered in a crash at an Indiana racetrack on Saturday night.
articles.content:
Justin Owen, a sprint car driver who was competing at a race in Indiana, died from injuries he suffered in a qualifying crash Saturday night, the U.S. Auto Club (USAC) announced. Owen was 26.
